home.welcomeSubtitle: Discover my journey, skills, and achievements
home.introText: Welcome to my personal portfolio website. Here you'll find information about my education, professional experience, social connections, and music events I've attended.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I'm a highly motivated and passionate Software Engineer with expertise in Real time systems in C++. I'm also a strong Chess player and enjoy writing blogs on Gaming.

quickNavigation.title: Quick Navigation
quickNavigation.description: Use the tabs above to explore different sections of my portfolio, from my educational background at ASU to my professional experience at companies like Ubisoft and MathWorks.

seo.title: Abhishek Deore - Software Engineer Portfolio
seo.description: Software Engineer with expertise in Game Development, C++, and AI systems. Experience at Ubisoft, MathWorks, and DataChat. Masters from Arizona State University.
